description.translate: Born to reign, fallen to save, as the day,	he returned, and till evening he stood.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Destin d'Aoran\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Né pour régner, tombé pour sauver,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7comme le jour, il revint, et jusqu'au soir, il tint.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Born to reign, fallen to save, as the day,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7he returned, and till evening he stood.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7SPD§a2 §7HUN§a1\"}"]}}
